translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

I have received the official letter from Your Excellency Electoral Board.

To be in agreement and ensure nothing is lacking on the 8th (as is my wish) I beseech Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency São Lourenço, February 26, 1840. Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães. General Chief of Police. Joaquim Francisco dos Santos Abreu. President of the Primary Assembly.

Official letter from Dr. Joaquim Francisco dos Santos Abreu, President of the Primary Assembly, dated February 26, received on the 28th and answered on the same day. Secretariat of the Presidency of the Republic To the citizen Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, General Chief of Police of Boqueirão. From the citizen Dr. Joaquim Francisco dos Santos Abreu. Election of the Constituent Assembly.

To the citizen Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, General Chief of Police of Boqueirão. From the citizen Dr. Joaquim Francisco dos Santos Abreu. Election of the Constituent Assembly.
